name: Cliff ginger
Description: A long green plant, harvested for it's thick, yellow roots. It grows in high places. It is said to hold benefits for endurance and stamina.

name: Serpent-tail
Description: A dark green herb that grows near ditches. The plant has sharp edges which can wound you if you aren't careful.

name: Embercap
Description: An orange mushroom that grows deep in caves. It's tranclucent cap glows in the dark.
